short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Statsig low-code experimentation tool, suitable for marketing and product teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Statsig sidecar allows Marketing teams to run website experiments without needing to write or modify code.  Experiments can be created and updated directly from the extension.

---

How it works:

Open Statsig Sidecar and click on your web page to make edits. Sidecar will shuffle website visitors into an A/B test and will give you the results using out-of-the-box metrics.

---
